extension.name: Tag Activity Tracker
extension.description: Track Tag Activities for Contacts when a Tag Added or Tag Removed.
extension.comments: Works in interface or via REST API. To query contacts via REST API. To query contact use target_contact_id. The field currently not exposed in API Explorer. when installed added Two Activity Types Tag Added, Tag Removed. On uninstall Activity types are removed, and Tag Added or Tag Removed activities that were added are be removed from contacts.
